page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE(1)
page.content: I usually wake up about 6.45a.m. I wash,then get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast.After i wash up the pots but never dry them.At 8.30.Igo to call for a small boy that I look after on the school bus.On the way Imeet a friend and we then walk to the bus stop. The bus arrives about 8.45. at the top of the village.It takes about 5 minutes to get to the next village which is where my school is.The bus drops us off near to the junior school, but the secondary school children including myself have a 5 minute walk to our school. School starts at 9 o'clock. After we have been to our form rooms we may have assembly,if not we wait until 9.25. when lessons start. The School times of lessons are as follows:({see next page please)
